name: Dwarf Balls (Brainyplanet)
description:
How far can you go without getting hit and falling into the void? Play solo or with other players across a variety of game modes.

MULTIPLAYER:

  • Play with players across various types of game modes!
  • Race or survive against players depending on game mode!
  • Win each round in a total of 3 Rounds and get ranked by winning the final round!
  • Get rewarded based on rounds completed!

EPISODES

  • Play various episodes. Each episode contains stages up to 10. 
  • Complete different Stages based on increasing difficulties.
  • Collect enough stars in each Episode to unlock the new one!

ENDLESS RUNNER

  • Survive the infinite layers of wall obstacles and score as best as you can!
  • Climb to the top of the leaderboards in global rankings.

POWER-UPS

  • Use power-ups to boost the gameplay!

CUSTOMIZE:

Unlock dozens of ball skins and customize them by painting them with colored patterns!

Features:

  • Play solo or real-time against players from across the world.
  • Roll on the endless road and get ranked on the leaderboard!
  • Survive and race on challenging maps in multiplayer!

Dwarf Balls Discord Server: https://discord.gg/4Wj6mM5mAU
